miniapp.name: Cipher
miniapp.subtitle: Turn words into symbols.
miniapp.description: Type a phrase and Cipher turns it into a shareable strip of glyphs—deterministic, compact, and oddly personal. Tap presets for daily use.
miniapp.ogDescription: Type a phrase and Cipher turns it into a shareable strip of glyphs—deterministic, compact, and oddly personal. Tap presets for daily use.
